page.title: 07HISTORY-PEOPLE
page.content: Several famous people have lived in our village through the ages.These include{Henry Adams,Edmund {Ludlow,Thomas Lyte and Henry Francis {Lyte. One of the most important of them was {Henry Adams}who in 1613 was a tenant holding 47 acres of Glebeland in Charlton Mackrell. Adams was a man of some education,and in 1638 when he was 55 years of age,he,with his family,crossed the Atlantic in a smallboat,and thereby established the illustrious family of Adams in the United States.His great grandson was {John Adams,the second President of the {United States.John's son,John Quincy Adams,later became the sixth national President.Henry Adams married Edith Squire in Charlton Mackrell church,and her sister Anne had married Aquila Purchase.
